content: Yes, that's a metric that we don't run the business to in terms of just sort of zooming out and looking at the progress that we're making, we're continuing to see signs of progress in sales productivity, we're also continuing to execute on a strategic realignment which part of that is deemphasizing and shedding non-core technology and customers and revenue that relate to that. And so we're going to continue to focus on driving the growth and making sure that we're increasing our profitability at the same time, which I think as we do that it's going to be good for our customers, our colleagues, and our shareholders alike.
